entry.title: Copenhagencoaching
entry.content:
copenhagencoaching.dk is made with jekyll and some javascript. It is made with the “why, how, what” concept and on the front we used the fullpage plugin. The design is made entirely by Benjamin. It has a lot of different collections, to ensure all of the different products. It has two forms from formspree and is set up to be edited in prose.io.

Visit the website
entry.summary: copenhagencoaching.dk is made with jekyll and some javascript. It is made with the “why, how, what” concept and on the front we used the fullpage plugin. The design is made entirely by Benjamin. It has a lot of different collections, to ensure all of the different products. It has two forms from formspree and is set up to be edited in prose.io.

entry.title: wteam
entry.content:
wteam.dk is made in jekyll, also with the fullpage plugin. The design is made by Benjamin.

Visit the website

entry.title: prolike
entry.content:
prolike.io is the website of my workplace, and it was here i was first introduced to jekyll, and the cleverness of hosting your website on github. I build the website in collaberation with my colleage Benjamin, who also designed it. The comercial messege of the site is based on the “why, how, what” concept. It mainly contains of the frontpage made with the fullpage plugin. It has two collections, our gigs and posts. Gigs; where we show our projects, and posts where we tell our stories.

Visit the website
entry.summary: prolike.io is the website of my workplace, and it was here i was first introduced to jekyll, and the cleverness of hosting your website on github. I build the website in collaberation with my colleage Benjamin, who also designed it. The comercial messege of the site is based on the “why, how, what” concept. It mainly contains of the frontpage made with the fullpage plugin. It has two collections, our gigs and posts. Gigs; where we show our projects, and posts where we tell our stories.

entry.title: Anne & Tina
entry.content:
frisoranneogtina.dk is a very simple site, partly build with the “why, how, what” concept. It contains only of the frontpage made width fullpage, and one collection of images. It is originally build with jekyll, with the extension jekyll-responsive-image. The structure of the html is made with boostrap. The design is made all by me.

Visit the website
